attributes.action: THE POLICE SHOULD ENFORCE SECT 145 OF THE HIGHWAY CODE.
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT A SAFE FOOTPATH SYSTEM THROUGHOUT THE UK, THIS IS WHY SECT 145 OF THE HIGHWAY CODE `MUST` BE ENFORCED OR SCRAPPED, THIS SECTION STATES: YOU ` MUST NOT` DRIVE ON OR OVER A PAVEMENT, FOOTPATH OR BRIDLEWAY EXCEPT TO GAIN LAWFUL ACCESS TO PROPERTY, OR IN CASE OF AN EMERGENCY.

[ LAWS HA1835 SECT 72 & RTA 1988 SECT 34 ]

BY ENFORCING THE ABOVE THE DISABLED, YOUNG/AGED AND PEOPLE WITH PUSHCHAIRS WOULD NOT HAVE TO STRUGGLE GETTING AROUND THEM, THIS CAN BE DANGEROUS HAVING TO GO OUT INTO THE ROAD.

PLEASE VOTE IF YOU HAVE THESE ISSUES.
